@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Action
sname
Action
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3
sextends
xworker.html.extjs.ExtThing
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Action/@24184
sname
disabled
stype
boolean
sinputtype
truefalse
sgroup
Action
sdescription
True to disable all components using this action, false to enable them (defaults to false).
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@attribute

when the component's primary event is trigger...
#$@text#$@

hidden

boolean

@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Action/@24189
sname
scope
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@thing
sextends
childDescriptor
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
The scope (<tt><b>this</b></tt> reference) in which the
<code><a href="output/Ext.Action.html#Ext.Action-handler" ext:member="handler" ext:cls="Ext.Action">handler</a></code> is executed. Defaults to this Button.
#$@text#$@
@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Action/@24190
sname
text
stype
string
sgroup
Action
sdescription
The text to set for all components using this action (defaults to '').
LvalidateOnBlur
false
LallowDecimals
false
LallowNegative
false
